Train Maxent model

Source: R/trainMaxent.R
trainMaxent.Rd

Train a MaxEnt model using the dismo package.

trainMaxent(presence, bg, rm, fc, type = c("cloglog", "logistic", "raw"),
  test = NULL, iter = 500, extra_args = NULL, folder = NULL)

Arguments

presence

SWD object with the presence locations.
bg

SWD object with the background locations.
rm

numeric. The value of the regularization multiplier.
fc

vector. The value of the feature combination, possible values are combinations of "l", "q", "p", "h" and "t".
type

The MaxEnt output type, possible values are "Cloglog", "Logistic", "Cumulative" and "Raw", default value "Cloglog".
test

SWD object with the test locations, default is NULL.
iter

numeric. Number of iterations used by the Maxent alghoritm, default is 500.
extra_args

vector. Extra arguments used to run MaxEnt, e.g. "removeduplicates=false", default is NULL.
folder

character. The folder name where to save the MaxEnt output, default is NULL meaning that is not saved. The folder is created in the working directory.

Value

The output of MaxEnt as Maxent object.

Examples

# NOT RUN {
model <- trainMaxent(presence, bg, rm)
# }

Contents

  • Value
